Articles.Content:
Does anyone know of a mod(s) that lets you edit the details of the kerbonaughts themselves? 

I want to be able to change the names and the uniform colours (other than orange or white) so that I can identify which kerbals are assigned to a particular crew, and it would be a bonus if you could select which specialism they were assigned to when hired (pilot, eng or sci).

 I know you can change the names in the config file, but this is very basic in that it only changes the names and the courage and stupidity stats, was hoping there was a more comprehensive mod that would make this easier.

Any suggestions would be most welcome.

Texture Replacer (+ texture packs) =

> 
> assign personalised head and suit textures for each Kerbal,
> assign suits based on class and experience level,

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-0-90-TextureReplacer-2-1-2-new-thread-the-old-one-is-broken](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107471-0-90-TextureReplacer-2-1-2-new-thread-the-old-one-is-broken)

FinalFrontier = personal merits.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67246-1-0-2-Final-Frontier-kerbal-individual-merits-0-8-2-1285](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67246-1-0-2-Final-Frontier-kerbal-individual-merits-0-8-2-1285)

KPseudonym = custom Kerbal names generation. (May be outdated, I don't know).

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96494-0-25-KPseudonym-Customize-Kerbal-name-generation](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96494-0-25-KPseudonym-Customize-Kerbal-name-generation)!

Miscellaneous

[http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tutorial:Modifing_Kerbals](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tutorial:Modifing_Kerbals)

> 
> I know you can change the names in the config file, but this is very basic in that it only changes the names and the courage and stupidity stats, was hoping there was a more comprehensive mod that would make this easier.

A kerbal job comes from his name and there is no way to change it without changing the name.

> 
> A kerbal job comes from his name and there is no way to change it without changing the name.

Yep, best you can do is add spaces to the name ("Bill Kerman " instead of "Bill Kerman") or change the last name ("Bill Kerman" becomes "Bill Ferman") until you get the profession you want.
